ca.ualberta.team7project.models

Class ThreadModel.BitmapData

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.team7project.models.ThreadModel.BitmapData
  • Enclosing class:
    ThreadModel

    protected class ThreadModel.BitmapData
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that stores a bitmap in json serializable form (a base64 encoded byte array)

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ThreadModel.BitmapData()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      android.graphics.Bitmap decode()
      Decodes the stored base64 string, then converts the bytes to a bitmap
      void encode(android.graphics.Bitmap image)
      Converts a bitmap to an array of bytes, then encodes the bytes as a base64 string

      • ThreadModel.BitmapData

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        public void encode(android.graphics.Bitmap image)
        Converts a bitmap to an array of bytes, then encodes the bytes as a base64 string

        Accepts null as the parameter, in which case the stored string is cleared

        Parameters:
        image - a bitmap to be encoded

      • decode

        public android.graphics.Bitmap decode()
        Decodes the stored base64 string, then converts the bytes to a bitmap
        Returns:
        a Java Bitmap corresponding to the base64 string stored , or null if no base64 string is stored
